name: Tetris 22
description:
Presenting Tetris 22! Tetris 22 is like tetris 99 but

No multiplayer

23 years newer but yet somehow worse better

An internet connection is required to download assets except if you download the version that has the assets in it.

Keys:

MAIN MENU:

Escape: Quits game

Enter: Starts game

O: Options Menu

GAME:

Down Arrow: Move piece down by one line

Up Arrow: Rotate piece

Left Arrow: Move piece left

Right Arrow: Move piece right

Slash: Hold piece

Escape: Pause/unpause

Q: Return to menu

OPTIONS:

M: Toggle mute

F: Toggle fullscreen

R: Delete high score

Escape: Return to menu
